short_summary: The buyer may need to procure professional services from specialists in MS SharePoint expertise for the duration of 12 months.
full_summary:
**NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)**


* **Reference Number**: cb-963-96786038
* **Solicitation Number**: 01B68-23-2552 (Amendment 7)
* **Publication Date**: November 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 6, 2023, 12:00 PM. ( *Note that the tender has since expired. )
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 4, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

**Procurement Details**

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Open competition, via selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: The highest combined rating of technical merit and price
* **Trade Agreements**: This procurement is open to bidders worldwide, in accordance with the World Trade Organization (WTO) Government Procurement Agreement, as well as several bilateral trade agreements (see below)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement • Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement • Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement • Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement • Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement • Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership • Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement • Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Project Scope**

* The Canadian Agricultural Adaptation and Sustainable Agriculture Alliance (CAASAA) requires the services of a Contractor to provide professional services resources, specializing in MS SharePoint expertise, to support the development of their Knowledge Workspace.

**Deliverables and Location**

* This contract is expected to span 24 months, with professional services support required on an as-and-when basis throughout this period
* The Contractor will provide resources to support the tasks identified through the Task Authorization (TA) process
* Work will be performed in Canada, with a specific focus on the National Capital Region (Ottawa).

**Contact Information**

* **Contracting Officer**: Val Judenne, val.judenne@agr.gc.ca, 555-555-5555

**Tender Documents**

* The tender documents can be accessed through the Canada buys website at: [link to the website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)
* Two attachments are available, one in English and one in French.

**Notes**

* The tender has expired.

This version has been rewritten and reformatted to remove extraneous information and to present the key details
